Notes: Furred wall at exterior or utility chase; insulation separate

Notes: Cement board at wet areas; moisture-resistant GWB above; includes vapour barrier

Notes: Standard mineral fibre tile; 15mm exposed T-bar; seismic clips in Alberta

Notes: Washrooms + shower/decon areas

Description: Rubber flooring (commercial; sheet or tile; installed)

Notes: Premium over standard hardware for accessible openings

Notes: At stairs; ramps; hazardous vehicular areas per Alberta Building Code
